data.text: Piny kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye gin mag Jehova Nyasaye,
nikech ne omiyo piny obet ewi nembe
En ngʼa manyalo idho wi got mar Jehova Nyasaye?
En mana ngʼat ma lwete ler kendo chunye bende ler,
Ngʼat ma kamano Jehova Nyasaye biro gwedho
Kamano e kaka tiengʼ mar joma dware chalo,
Ruoth man-gi duongʼni to en ngʼa?
Tingʼuru lodiu malo, yaye un dhorangeye;
